Enemies.Name: Dark-Magian Shadow Manticore
Enemies.Flavor: A giant, controlled, artificial creature made from an enormous toxic mass of miasma with the consciousness of a Dark Magian sorcerer sealed inside. This forsaken remnant of the great war travels through the miasma of Dark Magi and materializes whenever it moves in to attack any intruder to the Dark Magian continent.

Abilities.Name: Dispersal
Abilities.Info: Difficulty (6+) Dispersal The Manticore retreats into the miasma but can still be sensed on the peripherals where it will stalk its targets and join in on any further battles.

Attacks.Name: Dive
Attacks.Info: Only useable when descending from airborne position

Attacks.Name: Arcane : Cursed Breath
Info: Curses Magi-tech and equipment with great durability damage over time.
Removes decay from mana structure with vitalize

Attacks.Name: Consume
Attacks.Info: GRAB that plces target inside dragon

Enemies.Name: Cursed Wind Elemental
Enemies.Flavor: A concentrated Elemental entrapped by Sorcery made by the Dark magians to ensnare servants of elementalists who have long served them. They have since been assimilated to guard the barrens of Dark Magi

Drops.Name: Depleated Propagation Seal
Drops.Info: If charged, will cause sealed elemental to replicate overtime.

Enemies.Name: Specter Vigilant
Enemies.Flavor: The Specters are animated Mage armor and weapons that self-repair with its unique fusion process in conjunction with the atmosphere of Dark Magi. The Vigilant spirits wearing the armaments emanate from buried repositories that house their true components. But these tombs have long since been lost to the barren and their exact locations are not known even to the Dark Magians.

Attacks.Name: Collect
Attacks.Info: Mass with other specters to heal/increase energy via through sacrifice

Enemies.Name: Spectral Sentinel
Enemies.Flavor: The Specters are animated Mage armor and weapons that self-repair with its unique fusion process in conjunction with the atmosphere of Dark Magi. The Sentinel spirits wield Heavy Shields and pronged Spears and are usually found guarding entrances to Dark Magian outposts and strongholds. The Specters are born from buried repositories that house their true components. But these tombs have long since been lost to the barren and their exact locations are not known even to the Dark Magians.
